summary: Silver Bulletin net approval: Jan 2 -12.0 (approve 42%), Jan 21 -12.9, Jan 29 -14.6 (low), Feb 5 -13.7 (improving). RCP Jan 29: approve 42.6%, net -12.4. Derived approve for Feb 5: ~41.1%. Monte Carlo central estimate for Feb 14: ~41.1-41.2%.
content:
Key data points:
- Silver Bulletin Jan 2: approve 42%, disapprove 54%, net -12.0
- Silver Bulletin Jan 21: net -12.9
- Silver Bulletin ~Jan 29: net -14.6 (low point)
- Silver Bulletin Feb 5: net -13.7 (recovering from low)
- RCP average Jan 29: approve 42.6%, disapprove 55.0%, net -12.4
- Silver Bulletin total (approve+disapprove) â‰ˆ 96%
- Derived approve Feb 5: (96 - 13.7)/2 = 41.15%
- Feb 5 update notes: improvement driven partly by outlier polls (InsiderAdvantage +1)
- Strong disapproval broke 46% for first time
- Monte Carlo: median ~41.2%, 10th pct ~40.3%, 90th pct ~42.0%
